document.full_text: new mexico's governor broke the law by firing all members of the state's labor relations board and unions seek to reverse the move by an appeal to the state supreme court, a union leader said on thursday.
document.title: unions attack new mexico governor for firing labor board
lines_and_colors: new mexico's governor broke the law by firing all members of the state's labor relations board and unions seek to reverse the move by an appeal to the state supreme court, a union leader said on thursday.
